entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
